name: Eudoxia
description:
Eudoxia -- the lost city and mementos

This is a third perspective 3D puzzle game. In this level, the player needs to operate the main character Melo through the map of Eudoxia town by keyboard and mouse to avoid the rebel saints' pursuit. The goal of the game is to collect all 5 map pieces according to the tips of the mini map, and then open the stone door halfway up the mountain. At this point, Melo will be able to cross the clouds and enter the next world - the Temple.

Story:

Melo's grandma is the greatest oracle in Eudoxia city's history. Although she won't accompany Melo to sleep or bake yummy apple pie like other grandmas, she is the lovely person Melo ever know. Under her leadership, Eudoxia was developing prosperity and peace.

But everything changed 3 years ago after she suddenly disappeared. After that, Eudoxia's city grew desolate under the rebel saints. They even destroyed the map, the common man's way to the temple. Five pieces of the map are hidden all over the city.

 Melo thinks he's grown up and wants to follow his heart to find his grandmother. The first step was to collect mementos and open the gate to the temple.

Submission Info
